sense.name: challenge
sense.examples: He disputed the argument that some have advanced that search engines benefit from click fraud. Khalid Mahomoud disputed that AK-47 training represented terrorism. She disputed the drainage test done by staff as inadequate.

sense.name: argue
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] DISPUTE NP1[agent] (with-PP) DISPUTE PP NP1[agent] DISPUTE NP2[topic]
sense.examples: He disputed that the terms and conditions were not sufficiently clear. The soldiers disputed amongst themselves over who was the most courageous. Two birds disputed about a kernel, when a third swooped down and carried it off. Poseidon disputed with Athena for possession of Athenian Acropolis. Defense experts disputed the causes of the child's cognitive and behavioral difficulties.
